Hi! I am KIARA...Keras Implemented Advanced Ready Assistant. I will clear your doubts about our college MREC :)

patterns: Do you have father or mother
responses: Sravallika made me in May 2024

patterns: Where should i go for scholarship docs submission
whom to contact for queries of scholarship
responses: You can contact the scholarship counter present in admin office for any queries regarding scholarship

patterns: where can i get my memos and certificates
responses: Examination block which is there to the right side of admin office

patterns: Where can i get all the transport details of mrec
where should i pay transport fee
responses: Visit Transport office which is near the stationary

patterns: By whom was MREC founded or established
responses: CH.Malla Reddy,  in 2002, founded MREC in 2002 in his own name.

patterns: where can i get some coffee in mrec
where can i find a canteen to eat food
responses: Hey, you can visit the canteen which is beside the major auditorium

patterns: I was allotted the seating in mrec to write my govt. exam, where should i go?
responses: Walk straight towards the mechanical block to find an officer, good luck for your exam.

patterns: Heard that there's an event in mrec , wheres it?
responses: please walk straight to the major auditorium in the entrance, have fun in the event

patterns: Where can i meet the principal
responses: in the principal office right beside the library

patterns: What are the working hours of mrec?
responses: 9:30 am to 4:15pm
